notes: This workout plan is designed for an intermediate male individual aiming to target chest, triceps, and shoulders using gym equipment.

exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press
exercises.description: The barbell bench press is a compound exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps. Make sure to maintain proper form throughout the movement.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
exercises.description: The incline dumbbell press helps in targeting the upper chest muscles. Focus on controlled movements and squeeze at the top of the movement.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.description: Tricep dips are great for targeting the triceps. Keep your body upright and focus on using your triceps to lift your body weight.

exercises.name: Overhead Dumbbell Press
exercises.description: The overhead dumbbell press targets the shoulders and helps in building shoulder strength. Make sure to use a weight that you can control.

exercises.name: Lateral Raises
exercises.description: Lateral raises are great for targeting the side deltoids. Keep a slight bend in your elbows and lift the dumbbells to shoulder height.
